project.description: Merge a pull request after tests have passed in serial

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DEV_TOOLS_EXT_PULL_ID
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The pull id to use for the dev tools ext repo.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: ORIGIN_SERVER_PULL_ID
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The pull id to use for the origin-server repo.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: RHC_PULL_ID
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The pull id to use for the rhc repo.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DEV_TOOLS_PULL_ID
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The pull id to use for the dev tools repo.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
rm -rf li origin-dev-tools git clone git@github.com:openshift/origin-dev-tools.git git clone git@github.com:openshift/li.git
pushd li build/devenv clone_addtl_repos master --replace popd
if [ -n "$DEV_TOOLS_EXT_PULL_ID" ] then set +x echo "
*****Locally Merging Pull Request: https://github.com/openshift/li/pull/$DEV_TOOLS_EXT_PULL_ID" set -x test_pull_requests --local_merge_pull_request $DEV_TOOLS_EXT_PULL_ID --repo li fi
if [ -n "$ORIGIN_SERVER_PULL_ID" ] then set +x echo "
*****Locally Merging Pull Request: https://github.com/openshift/origin-server/pull/$ORIGIN_SERVER_PULL_ID" set -x test_pull_requests --local_merge_pull_request $ORIGIN_SERVER_PULL_ID --repo origin-server fi
if [ -n "$RHC_PULL_ID" ] then set +x echo "
*****Locally Merging Pull Request: https://github.com/openshift/rhc/pull/$RHC_PULL_ID" set -x test_pull_requests --local_merge_pull_request $RHC_PULL_ID --repo rhc fi
if [ -n "$DEV_TOOLS_PULL_ID" ] then set +x echo "
*****Locally Merging Pull Request: https://github.com/openshift/origin-dev-tools/pull/$DEV_TOOLS_PULL_ID" set -x test_pull_requests --local_merge_pull_request $DEV_TOOLS_PULL_ID --repo origin-dev-tools fi
set +x echo "
" set -x
pushd li build/devenv build merge_pull_requests ${BUILD_NUMBER} --terminate --install_from_local_source popd
# Make sure all the pull requests will merge cleanly if [ -n "$DEV_TOOLS_EXT_PULL_ID" ] then test_pull_requests --test_merge_pull_request $DEV_TOOLS_EXT_PULL_ID --repo li fi
if [ -n "$ORIGIN_SERVER_PULL_ID" ] then test_pull_requests --test_merge_pull_request $ORIGIN_SERVER_PULL_ID --repo origin-server fi
if [ -n "$RHC_PULL_ID" ] then test_pull_requests --test_merge_pull_request $RHC_PULL_ID --repo rhc fi
if [ -n "$DEV_TOOLS_PULL_ID" ] then test_pull_requests --test_merge_pull_request $DEV_TOOLS_PULL_ID --repo origin-dev-tools fi
# Do the merge if [ -n "$DEV_TOOLS_EXT_PULL_ID" ] then test_pull_requests --merge_pull_request $DEV_TOOLS_EXT_PULL_ID --repo li fi
if [ -n "$ORIGIN_SERVER_PULL_ID" ] then test_pull_requests --merge_pull_request $ORIGIN_SERVER_PULL_ID --repo origin-server fi
if [ -n "$RHC_PULL_ID" ] then test_pull_requests --merge_pull_request $RHC_PULL_ID --repo rhc fi
if [ -n "$DEV_TOOLS_PULL_ID" ] then test_pull_requests --merge_pull_request $DEV_TOOLS_PULL_ID --repo origin-dev-tools fi
